# removeSplitViewItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a specified split view item from the split view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeSplitViewItem(_ splitViewItem: NSSplitViewItem)
```

## Parameters

- **splitViewItem**: The split view item to remove.



## Discussion

After you remove a split view item, the system adjusts the layout of the split view accordingly.

## Modifying a Split View Controller

- **addSplitViewItem(_:)**: Adds a split view item to the end of the array of split view items.
- **insertSplitViewItem(_:at:)**: Adds a split view item to the array of split view items at the specified index position.
